title: What are your services like?
answer:
SpeedOne360 is Greenfoot's very fast and reliable internet service that is provided to homes (individuals) and enterprises.

To get started, you purchase our equipment and we will send our installers to come set it up at your place. You can then subscribe to your preferred plan and enjoy unlimited data.

title: Are there Data limits?
answer: No, Our connection is fast and unlimited. Such that your monthly subscription lasts for the month

title: Will you throttle my speed?
answer: No. Your monthly subscription lasts for the months as well as the speed.

title: What are my speed options?
answer: It depends on the package you want as the company have different packages depending on the speed. The number of devices, amount of streaming and downloading will all factor into the speed that you will need.

title: Are the speeds guaranteed? what happens if my speed isn't fast enough?
answer: Yes, our speeds are guaranteed. If your speed isn't fast enough, it could be as a result of too many people using your connection. For further complaints, kindly contact the company's tech support.

title: Can I provide my own router and equipment?
Who will install the equipments?
answer: The company has reliable in-house installers and you can also get an installer yourself (N.B: External installation attracts additional fee for activation).

title: What happens when there is a problem with my internet connection?
answer: Kindly contact the company's tech support.

title: How can i connect to your service?
answer: contact sales department by calling 018883790 or send us an email to sales@greenfoot.com.ng or visit any of our friendship centers in all states across Nigeria

title: How much is your installation fee?
answer: this depends on your location and option of service; please Click Me to do the Survey and get a quote (ensure you are at the exact location where you need the service and make sure your location is turned on)
